description:
JuffEd is a free, cross-platform text editor for programmers and advanced users. Has syntax highlighting for many languages, code folding,
find/replace using plain text and regexps, code completion, multiple charsets and many other useful features.
#Features:
- syntax highlighting
- powerful search using regexps
- code completion
- sessions
- plugins
- multiple charsets (with auto-detection)
summary: QScintilla-based tabbed text editor with syntax highlighting.
author: Mikhail Murzin
